document.full_text: at least 10 iranian exiles were killed at camp ashraf in iraq on friday, a hospital source said, after security forces clashed with residents of the iranian dissident camp north of baghdad overnight.
document.title: at least 10 iranian exiles killed in clashes in iraq
lines_and_colors: at least 10 iranian exiles were killed at camp ashraf in iraq on friday, a hospital source said, after security forces clashed with residents of the iranian dissident camp north of baghdad overnight.
